info.title: AT Protocol XRPC API
info.summary: An unofficial conversion of AT Protocol's lexicons to OpenAPI's schema format.

get.summary: Get private preferences attached to the account.
Get a list of actors suggested for following. Used in discovery UIs.

post.summary: Sets the private preferences attached to the account.

get.summary: Find actors (profiles) matching search criteria.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: DEPRECATED: use 'q' instead

schema.description: DEPRECATED: use 'q' instead

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: search query string; syntax, phrase, boolean, and faceting is unspecified, but Lucene query syntax is recommended

schema.description: search query string; syntax, phrase, boolean, and faceting is unspecified, but Lucene query syntax is recommended

get.summary: Find actor suggestions for a search term.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: DEPRECATED: use 'q' instead

schema.description: DEPRECATED: use 'q' instead

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: search query prefix; not a full query string

schema.description: search query prefix; not a full query string

get.summary: Retrieve a list of feeds created by a given actor
A view of the posts liked by an actor.
A view of an actor's feed.
Compose and hydrate a feed from a user's selected feed generator
Get information about a specific feed offered by a feed generator, such as its online status
Get information about a list of feed generators
A view of a recent posts from actors in a list
A view of an actor's feed.
Get a list of suggested feeds for the viewer.
A view of the user's home timeline.
Who is the requester's account blocking?
Who is following an actor?
Who is an actor following?
Fetch a list of actors
Which lists is the requester's account blocking?
Which lists is the requester's account muting?
Fetch a list of lists that belong to an actor
Who does the viewer mute?
Get suggested follows related to a given actor.

post.summary: Mute an actor by did or handle.
Mute a list of actors.
Unmute an actor by did or handle.
Unmute a list of actors.
Register for push notifications with a service
Notify server that the user has seen notifications.
Allow a labeler to apply labels directly.

get.summary: DEPRECATED: will be removed soon, please find a feed generator alternative
An unspecced view of globally popular feed generators

post.summary: Disable an account from receiving new invite codes, but does not invalidate existing codes

note.description: Additionally add a note describing why the invites were disabled

post.summary: Disable some set of codes and/or all codes associated with a set of users
Re-enable an accounts ability to receive invite codes

note.description: Additionally add a note describing why the invites were enabled

get.summary: View details about an account.
Admin view of invite codes
View details about a moderation action.
List moderation actions related to a subject.
View details about a moderation report.
List moderation reports related to a subject.

parameters.name: actionedBy
parameters.description: Get all reports that were actioned by a specific moderator

schema.description: Get all reports that were actioned by a specific moderator

parameters.name: reporters
parameters.description: Filter reports made by one or more DIDs

parameters.name: reverse
parameters.description: Reverse the order of the returned records? when true, returns reports in chronological order

schema.description: Reverse the order of the returned records? when true, returns reports in chronological order

get.summary: View details about a record.
View details about a repository.
Fetch the service-specific the admin status of a subject (account, record, or blob)

repo.description: The handle or DID of the repo.

swapCommit.description: Compare and swap with the previous commit by cid.

Take a moderation action on a repo.

Update the service-specific admin status of a subject (account, record, or blob)

parameters.description: The handle to resolve.

schema.description: The handle to resolve.

Report a repo or a record.
Apply a batch transaction of creates, updates, and deletes.

repo.description: The handle or DID of the repo.

parameters.description: The handle or DID of the repo.

get.summary: Get a record.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The handle or DID of the repo.

schema.description: The handle or DID of the repo.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The NSID of the record collection.

schema.description: The NSID of the record collection.

parameters.name: rkey
parameters.description: The key of the record.

schema.description: The key of the record.

parameters.name: cid
parameters.description: The CID of the version of the record. If not specified, then return the most recent version.

schema.description: The CID of the version of the record. If not specified, then return the most recent version.

get.summary: List a range of records in a collection.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: The NSID of the record type.

schema.description: The NSID of the record type.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return.

parameters.name: rkeyStart
parameters.description: DEPRECATED: The lowest sort-ordered rkey to start from (exclusive)

schema.description: DEPRECATED: The lowest sort-ordered rkey to start from (exclusive)

parameters.name: rkeyEnd
parameters.description: DEPRECATED: The highest sort-ordered rkey to stop at (exclusive)

schema.description: DEPRECATED: The highest sort-ordered rkey to stop at (exclusive)

parameters.name: reverse
parameters.description: Reverse the order of the returned records?

schema.description: Reverse the order of the returned records?

collection.description: The NSID of the record collection.

repo.description: The handle or DID of the repo.

post.summary: Upload a new blob to be added to repo in a later request.
Confirm an email using a token from com.atproto.server.requestEmailConfirmation.
Create an account.
Create an app-specific password.
Create an invite code.
Create an invite code.
Create an authentication session.

identifier.description: Handle or other identifier supported by the server for the authenticating user.

post.summary: Delete a user account with a token and password.
Delete the current session.

get.summary: Get a document describing the service's accounts configuration.
Get all invite codes for a given account
Get information about the current session.
List all app-specific passwords.

post.summary: Refresh an authentication session.
Initiate a user account deletion via email.
Request an email with a code to confirm ownership of email
Request a token in order to update email.
Initiate a user account password reset via email.
Reserve a repo signing key for account creation.

did.description: The did to reserve a new did:key for

signingKey.description: Public signing key in the form of a did:key.

post.summary: Reset a user account password using a token.
Revoke an app-specific password by name.
Update an account's email.

token.description: Requires a token from com.atproto.sever.requestEmailUpdate if the account's email has been confirmed.

get.summary: List dids and root cids of hosted repos

post.summary: Upgrade a repo to v3

birthDate.description: The birth date of the owner of the account.

feed.description: The URI of the feed, or an identifier which describes the feed.

hideRepliesByUnfollowed.description: Hide replies in the feed if they are not by followed users.

hideQuotePosts.description: Hide quote posts in the feed.

prioritizeFollowedUsers.description: Show followed users at the top of all replies.

app.bsky.embed.images.aspectRatio.description: width:height represents an aspect ratio. It may be approximate, and may not correspond to absolute dimensions in any given unit.

app.bsky.feed.post.textSlice.description: Deprecated. Use app.bsky.richtext instead -- A text segment. Start is inclusive, end is exclusive. Indices are for utf16-encoded strings.

app.bsky.feed.threadgate.mentionRule.description: Allow replies from actors mentioned in your post.

app.bsky.feed.threadgate.followingRule.description: Allow replies from actors you follow.

app.bsky.feed.threadgate.listRule.description: Allow replies from actors on a list.

app.bsky.graph.defs.modlist.description: A list of actors to apply an aggregate moderation action (mute/block) on

app.bsky.graph.defs.curatelist.description: A list of actors used for curation purposes such as list feeds or interaction gating

app.bsky.richtext.facet.mention.description: A facet feature for actor mentions.

app.bsky.richtext.facet.byteSlice.description: A text segment. Start is inclusive, end is exclusive. Indices are for utf8-encoded strings.

com.atproto.admin.defs.takedown.description: Moderation action type: Takedown. Indicates that content should not be served by the PDS.

com.atproto.admin.defs.flag.description: Moderation action type: Flag. Indicates that the content was reviewed and considered to violate PDS rules, but may still be served.

com.atproto.admin.defs.acknowledge.description: Moderation action type: Acknowledge. Indicates that the content was reviewed and not considered to violate PDS rules.

com.atproto.admin.defs.escalate.description: Moderation action type: Escalate. Indicates that the content has been flagged for additional review.

com.atproto.label.defs.label.description: Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record)

src.description: DID of the actor who created this label

uri.description: AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource which this label applies to

cid.description: optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to

val.description: the short string name of the value or type of this label

neg.description: if true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label

cts.description: timestamp when this label was created

com.atproto.label.defs.selfLabels.description: Metadata tags on an atproto record, published by the author within the record.

com.atproto.label.defs.selfLabel.description: Metadata tag on an atproto record, published by the author within the record. Note -- schemas should use #selfLabels, not #selfLabel.

val.description: the short string name of the value or type of this label

com.atproto.moderation.defs.reasonSpam.description: Spam: frequent unwanted promotion, replies, mentions

com.atproto.moderation.defs.reasonViolat.description: Direct violation of server rules, laws, terms of service

com.atproto.moderation.defs.reasonRude.description: Rude, harassing, explicit, or otherwise unwelcoming behavior

com.atproto.moderation.defs.reasonOther.description: Other: reports not falling under another report category

rev.description: The rev of the emitted commit

since.description: The rev of the last emitted commit from this repo

com.atproto.sync.subscribeRepos.repoOp.description: A repo operation, ie a write of a single record. For creates and updates, cid is the record's CID as of this operation. For deletes, it's null.
